required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Tolerability of Lu AG06479 in Healthy Young Men
clinical_study.official_title: Interventional, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Sequential-group, Single-ascending Oral Dose Study Investigating the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetic and Pharmacodynamic Properties of Lu AG06479 and Open-label Cross-over Study to Investigate Intra-subject Variability and Effect of Food in Healthy Young Men

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate the safety and tolerability of Lu AG06479 and what the body does to Lu AG06479 after swallowing single doses of the drug

detailed_description.textblock:
Part A: randomized, sequential
Part B: open-label, cross-over

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with treatment emergent adverse events (Safety and Tolerability)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to Day 9 (Part A and B)
primary_outcome.description: Based on the safety assessments (e.g. clinical safety laboratory tests, vital signs, weight and ECG parameters)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From pre-dose to Day 5 (Part A and B)
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the Lu AG06479 concentration-time curve from time zero to infinity (AUC0-inf)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From pre-dose to Day 5 (Part A and B)
From pre-dose to Day 5 (Part A and B)
secondary_outcome.description: Maximum observed plasma concentration for Lu AG06479

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part A: Single dose of Lu AG06479 or Placebo
Part B: Repeated dose of Lu AG06479 and Food interaction
arm_group.description: Sequence B1: Fed - Fasting- Fasting Sequence B2: Fasting- Fed - Fasting Sequence B3: Fasting- Fasting - Fed

intervention.arm_group_label: Part A: Single dose of Lu AG06479 or Placebo
Part B: Repeated dose of Lu AG06479 and Food interaction
Part A: Single dose of Lu AG06479 or Placebo

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy, young, non-smoking men, weight ≥60 kg, and a body mass index (BMI) ≥18.5 kg/m2 and ≤30 kg/m2 at the Screening Visit.
Other in- and exclusion criteria may apply

overall_official.last_name: Email contact via H. Lundbeck A/S

overall_contact.last_name: Email contact via H. Lundbeck A/S

contact.last_name: Email contact via H. Lundbeck A/S
